page.title: 12A policeman's day in Dalston
page.content: 9.25pm Mr Blaire was coming back for something to eat and a car reversed out in front of him with tyres squealing and Mr Blaire had to break hard so not to bang into him.Then the man drove away at top spead on the wrong side of the road Mr Blaire went after him the man went right down the Green and Mr Blaire stopped him at The Plough near Durdar the man was breathalized for drunken driving and was told that he would have to go to court. 9.45 Mr Blaire came home for something to eat. 10.15 Mr Blaire went out again. 10.25 _ 10.30 Mr Blaire went to all the pubs in the area he covers. 11.00 Mr Blaire checked a man at Bunkers hill(see page 18)
